programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Day two of the competition is at Artist Residence in Penzance, Cornwall. The guests generally like the quirky nature of the art-filled rooms, but Blackpool veterans Craig and Alec Coleman think their room is too modern and find a hole in the ceiling.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Third to host are couple Alec and Craig Coleman of the award-winning Edenfield Guesthouse in Blackpool. Craig plans to reveal his cabaret-star alter-ego Cybil Du Vuax to his unsuspecting guests.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Day four of the competition is at The New Inn at Portland in Dorset, run by publicans and husband and wife team Stacey and Spencer Cullum. The hosts decide to show their guests a typical island activity - sandcastle building.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The weeks last visit is to Valley View in Pendle, Lancashire where sisters Sharon and Deby hope the BandBers get onboard with glamping. But one guest thinks his pod is like a student flat...

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.sub-title: Celebrity Special with Jacqui and Sarah Greene
programme.desc: Broadcasting icon Sarah Greene teams up with Jacqui to explore a three-bedroom terrace in Northampton, where the work is already underway. We plunder the Hammer archives to show off one of Dions first auction lots, a converted 16th-century chapel. And fast forward to the present day, where Dions in Stoke to view a three-bedroom detached property undergoing a terrific transformation.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Join Natasha Raskin Sharp for todays show from Builth Wells in Powys, mid Wales. Experts Ben Cooper and Kate Bliss help two red and blue teams, who each have £300 each to spend on three items. Natasha pays a visit to the nearby town of Llanwrtyd Wells, where she has a go at the local sport of bog snorkelling. At the auction, theres great excitement, but which team will be victorious?

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps
programme.sub-title: The Aftermath Part One: Waiting for Gaz
programme.desc: A musical extravaganza in The Archer. Janet waits for Gaz to return to the pub and announce he has chosen her, unaware he has been in an accident and has already made his choice - Donna. She is convinced he will pick her and is heartbroken when her dreams are crushed. How will she finally realise that she deserves better than Gaz and needs to put Corinthian first?

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps
programme.sub-title: The Aftermath Part Two: Sliding Gaz
programme.desc: Gaz has fallen into a coma shortly after telling Donna he wanted to be with her. As she sits by his bedside, she begs God to give him back, saying that she is prepared to take any consequences. She imagines two separate realities, one where Gaz is back to full health and one where he is paralysed. Both possibilities are followed in parallel.

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: Sports mockumentary about GB Paralympian Darren Silverstone, who stole the hearts of a nation before his infamous chokey-o in Tokyo. For the first time, he tells his story - and starts his glorious comeback. In Tokyo 2020, Darren Silverstone was the Paras GB poster boy. (He was on yoghurts, too.) He cruised to the final and charmed the nation along the way with his signature dance move, the dazzle.

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys

programme.desc: Agnes world is turned upside down when an angel arrives in Finglas and grants her a wish to see what life would be like if shed never been born.

programme.desc: Its Christmas in Finglas, and Mrs Brown is coping with life after lockdown. As she gets news of a very special competition, Grandad, Winnie and Father Damien come to her for help.

programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: Its Christmas in Lichfield. Lorna is full of the Yuletide Spirit, in more ways than one, Ben and Dale both want to make Rachels holiday special - and Ken gets stuck in the middle.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: When a zombie pandemic threatens to destroy humanity, a former United Nations investigator is forced back into service to try to uncover the source of the infection.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Malcolm goes to great lengths to fulfil his dads wishes. Meanwhile, Catherine wants Gemmas help to conceive a baby with Gary. Gemma is shocked when she learns of Malcolms secret.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.sub-title: For Future Reference, Trousers Stay On
programme.desc: Whilst preparations are being made for Sadie and Malcolms birthday, Malcolm gets to know Tommy. Gemma secures her first job interview, forcing her to make a difficult decision.

programme.title: The War Between the Land and the Sea
programme.desc: When a fearsome and ancient species emerges from the ocean, dramatically revealing themselves to humanity, an international crisis is triggered. With the entire population at risk, UNIT step into action as the land and sea wage war.

programme.title: My Life at Christmas with Anita Rani
programme.desc: Anita Rani meets Paralympian and broadcaster Ade Adepitan to hear his inspirational life story and how sport, spirituality and the festive season have shaped him. Anita discovers his life-affirming Christmas story, from contracting polio as a toddler in Nigeria, to growing up with a disability in east London in the 1970s, to the rocky road that led to Paralympic glory with the British wheelchair basketball team. Now a respected broadcaster, Ade shines a light on causes close to his heart.

programme.title: Whats the Monarchy For?
programme.desc: David Dimbleby asks how far the royals will go to maintain public support - and can they succeed?

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection
programme.sub-title: Palpung Changchub Dargyeling Buddhist Temple, Brynmawr
programme.desc: Prayer and Reflection from the Tibetan Buddhist temple in Brynmawr.

programme.title: James Martin: Home Comforts at Christmas
programme.desc: James Martin gets ahead for Christmas, providing lots of clever tips and tricks to save time and stress on the big day. He is joined by Sir Michael Parkinson.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programmes photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary.

programme.title: This Farming Life
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner and Scotlands farmers are battling the elements to keep things running. A deep freeze descends on Johns farm, creating havoc with the farm machinery and forcing them to cancel their glamping pod guests.

programme.title: The Polar Bear Family and Me
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan and the team return to Svalbard in September on the trail of Lyra and her cub Miki. They have been away for six weeks and dont know if either bear is still alive. Lyras collar hasnt sent a signal for a month - finding her this time will be a huge challenge.

programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Best Bites
programme.desc: The best bits and favourite moments from Saturday Kitchen.

programme.title: High Society
programme.desc: A remake of `The Philadelphia Story, this film is about the society wedding of Tracy Lord to priggish George Kittredge. Her ex-husband lives next door, and is organising a jazz festival for the same weekend. The attentions of a reporter and his photographer cause her to rethink her upcoming nuptuals.

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers: Coming Home for Christmas
programme.desc: The Hairy Bikers are back. After Dave received his recent cancer diagnosis, it looked like the Bikers adventures could be over. But now, reunited with his best mate Si, the boys are back on the road.

programme.title: The London International Horse Show LIVE
programme.desc: Coverage of the 2025 London International Horse Show.

programme.title: The Heroes of Telemark
programme.desc: Taut action-adventure tale based on the true story of the Norwegian resistance and their efforts to destroy a heavy-water plant established during World War II by the occupying Nazis. As the Germans move ever closer to the secret of nuclear fission, the saboteurs plot to prevent the strategic materials from going into production.

programme.title: Wild Horses, the Rockies and Me
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan heads to the Rocky Mountains in search of wild horses. Finding two stallions battling over a herd, Gordon immerses himself in their world, hoping to win their trust.

programme.title: Victoria Woods Secret List
programme.desc: Back in 2009, Victoria wrote a list of her favourite moments from her seminal 80s series, intending to use it as a compilation show of self-selected best bits. The list remained locked away in her personal office until now.

programme.title: Oppenheimer
programme.desc: During World War II, Lt. Gen. Leslie Groves Jr. appoints physicist J. Robert Oppenheimer to work on the top-secret Manhattan Project. Oppenheimer and a team of scientists spend years developing the atomic bomb, forever changing the course of history.

programme.title: Raging Bull
programme.desc: The story of Jake LaMotta, a former middleweight boxing champion, whose reputation for tenacity and success in the ring was offset by his troubled domestic life: full of rage, jealousy, and suspicion, particularly towards his wife and manager/brother, which in the end left him destitute, alone, and seeking redemption.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programmes photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary.

programme.title: Celebrity MasterChef
programme.desc: Today, things take a sweet turn, as pastry skills and spectacular creations come to the fore. Nobody should get too comfy, as one more will be heading home. Finals week kicks off with a trip to one of the countrys most celebrated potteries, Wedgwood, which is celebrating the 250th anniversary of its most famous clay creations - Jasperware. The celebrities will be serving a delectable afternoon tea for some special guests, including renowned potters and the Lord Mayor of Stoke-on-Trent.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica convinces a reluctant Chandler to travel to Las Vegas to invite his estranged cross-dressing father to their wedding. Meanwhile, Rachel is furious that she is the only friend who Monica has not allowed to drive the Porsche that her father gave her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler And Monicas Wedding - Part 1

programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler And Monicas Wedding - Part 2
programme.desc: Joey encounters problems trying to get off the movie set to officiate the wedding when the star turns up drunk.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away
programme.desc: Monicas first Thanksgiving dinner for the gang goes horribly wrong when they all get locked on the roof after watching a giant runaway balloon from the New York Thanksgiving parade. Elsewhere, Joey wins his first modelling gig as the poster boy for a venereal disease campaign, and Ross competes with his ex-wife to communicate with their unborn baby.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl From Poughkeepsie

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds out that her picture of her father, whom she has never known, is just a generic photograph that comes with the picture frame. Elsewhere, after Ross makes Monicas heater malfunction, her Christmas party guests swelter in the middle of winter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel wonders if shell ever get another job after she quits Central Perk, Joeys new job selling Christmas trees upsets Phoebe, and Ross accidentally breaks a little girls leg.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Flightless birds lead a mostly happy existence, except for Red, who just cant get past the daily annoyances of life. His temperament leads him to anger management class, where he meets fellow misfits Chuck and Bomb. Red becomes even more agitated when his feathered brethren welcome green pigs to their island paradise. As the swine begin to get under his skin, Red joins forces with Chuck and Bomb to investigate the real reason behind their mysterious arrival.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Alan Parrish disappeared as a young boy. Nobody believes his friends story that he was sucked into the game they were playing. Twenty-six years later, two children find the game in their attic, and when they start to play, Alan is released, but the game isnt over yet, and Alan must finish before he is really free.

programme.sub-title: The One with All the Thanksgivings
programme.desc: As the gang digests Monicas huge Thanksgiving meal, everyone reminisces about their worst Thanksgiving ever.

programme.sub-title: The One With the Inappropriate Sister
programme.desc: After returning from another disappointing audition, Joey tries to write a play in which he can star. Meanwhile, Rachel gets a date with her neighbour Danny, but is perturbed to discover his extremely intimate relationship with his sexy sister.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine, while Ross and Monica resurrect their silly high school dance routine for a television special.

programme.sub-title: The One With the Holiday Armadillo
programme.desc: Ross unexpectedly finds himself looking after Ben and decides to do something special for Christmas. Since all the Santa costumes have been rented out, Ross dons the best outfit left and entertains Ben as the holiday armadillo.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Ross Step Forward
programme.desc: Ross new girlfriend wants to put their photograph on Christmas cards, Rachel eyes Joey as a possible romantic partner, and the newlyweds cope with Chandlers boss as he goes through a divorce.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Christmas in Tulsa

While he works, Chandler recalls some of the more embarrassing moments from previous holidays shared with his friends.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Raney Ranch
programme.desc: As Marty recovers from a bad fall, the Raneys scramble against the oncoming winter to finish cabin walls and build a staircase from an ancient family spruce. Matt leads a last-ditch moose hunt pivotal to keeping them stocked with meat through spring.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Raney Ranch
programme.desc: Marty commits the family to a quick mini-rescue in the community. Misty must complete her cabin roof without Maciah. And when Marty gives a cabin-warming gift to Mollee, he must figure out how to transport it to the Upper 20.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Raney Ranch

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Raney Ranch
programme.desc: An inferno engulfs Marty and Mollees cabin at the onset of winter and the Raneys must rally like never before to complete the unfinished clifftop cabin on The Upper 20 in record time complete with heat, water and power.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Raney Ranch

The sisters blame everything from the weather to the tablecloths for their failures.

programme.desc: The Lannisters send Myrcella away from harm; Arya has a surprise visitor; Dany makes a vow; Robb and Catelyn receive crucial news; Jon gets a chance to prove himself.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jaime meets a relative; Dany receives an invitation to the House of the Undying; Theon leads a search party; Jon gets lost in the wilderness; Cersei counsels Sansa.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Theon holds down the fort; Arya calls in a debt; Robb is betrayed; Dany ignores Jorahs advice; Stannis and Davos approach their destination.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion and the Lannisters fight for their lives as Stannis fleet attacks Kings Landing.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Theon incites his men to action; Luwin offers advice; Brienne silences Jaime; Arya receives a gift; Dany goes to a strange place; Jon proves himself.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon is brought before the King Beyond the Wall; Tyrion asks for his reward; Littlefinger offers Sansa a way out; Cersei hosts a dinner for the royal family; Dany sails into Slavers Bay.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Sansa says too much; Shae asks Tyrion for a favor; Jaime finds a way to pass the time; Arya encounters the Brotherhood Without Banners.

programme.title: The Kings Speech
programme.desc: Afflicted with a stammer, Prince Albert, the Duke of York, dreads the speaking engagements that come with being the son of King George V.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Court composer Antonio Salieri is shaken: In 1781, the brilliant free spirit Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart comes to Vienna and competes with him. Salieri decides to destroy him.

programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.desc: A wide-eyed young scion of a conservative family embarks on a mission to infiltrate the wealthy neighbouring clan dominated by ruthless railroad tycoon George Russell, his rakish son, Larry, and his ambitious wife, Bertha.

programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.desc: A wide-eyed young scion of a conservative family embarks on a mission to infiltrate the wealthy neighbouring clan dominated by ruthless railroad tycoon George Russell, his rakish son, Larry, and his ambitious wife, Bertha.

programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.desc: An unfortunate development finds Georges new rail station under threat; Marian continues to see Mr. Raikes despite Agnes warnings.

programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.desc: A wide-eyed young scion of a conservative family embarks on a mission to infiltrate the wealthy neighbouring clan dominated by ruthless railroad tycoon George Russell, his rakish son, Larry, and his ambitious wife, Bertha.

programme.title: All Her Fault
programme.desc: Years after suffering a tragedy, a chance encounter with a young Milo leads Carrie to fixate on the boy; her obsession takes a dark turn while planning the kidnapping, forcing her to ask for help when things go awry, with deadly consequences.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Diana, princess of the Amazons, is raised to be an unconquerable warrior on a sheltered island paradise. She discovers her full powers and true destiny after leaving home to join the fight to end all wars.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis -- and the surface world -- from his power-hungry brother.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: The Queen of Hearts has outlawed Christmas! Can St Nick, Alice, the Mad Hatter and March Hare save the day? Animation with Emilia Clarke, Gerard Butler and Simone Ashley. (2024, 90 mins)

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Curious George is an inquisitive little monkey with an insatiable taste for adventure. Georges fun-loving enthusiastic nature endears him to new friends, but also lands him in a series of misadventures.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: The Queen of Hearts has outlawed Christmas! Can St Nick, Alice, the Mad Hatter and March Hare save the day? Animation with Emilia Clarke, Gerard Butler and Simone Ashley. (2024, 90 mins)

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Flightless birds lead a mostly happy existence, except for Red, who just cant get past the daily annoyances of life. His temperament leads him to anger management class, where he meets fellow misfits Chuck and Bomb. Red becomes even more agitated when his feathered brethren welcome green pigs to their island paradise. As the swine begin to get under his skin, Red joins forces with Chuck and Bomb to investigate the real reason behind their mysterious arrival.

programme.title: The LEGO NINJAGO Movie
programme.desc: Master Wu, as wise-cracking as he is wise, leads a fierce team of secret ninja warriors to defeat the evil warlord Garmadon and save Ninjago City.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Spoiled by their upbringing and with no idea of what wildlife is really like, Alex the lion, Marty the zebra and hypochondriac giraffe Melman swap New York Central Zoo for madcap Madagascar, on a journey to find their friend.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The sequel to `Madagascar, in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Swept into the sea during a family cruise, a young girl named Shenxiu stumbles upon a mysterious restaurant under the waves. There, she meets the scheming head chef and his ragtag crew of adorable otters and sarcastic walruses.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Son of Memphis and Norma, little sweet penguin Mumble has a big problem: he cant sing a single note. In a world where everyone needs a heart song to attract a soul mate, Mumble feels he doesnt belong there. Our hero Mumble is the worst singer in the world, but he can tap dance brilliantly.

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Mumbles son Erik hasnt yet found his talents, and he goes with his friends to Adelie-land which is ruled by a penguin who can fly. When Erik returns to Emperor-land and finds them trapped under big walls of ice. Will Erik be able to save his family and friends before it is too late?

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A champion NASCAR drivers cosy position alongside his best friend at the top of the championship is threatened by a flamboyant French newcomer. With his confidence shattered, the driver draws on the help of his father and some eccentric training techniques to claw his way back to the top.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: A group of twentysomethings attempt to survive an onslaught of earthquakes, asteroids and other impending catastrophes.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Bridgets brand new relationship with Darcy has taken a plummet due to her jealousy of his workmate. Having previously left the publishing house she worked for to avoid her boss, Daniel, with whom she had an unsuccessful romance, she finds him along for the ride on her new job, which takes her to Thailand, and almost into his arms.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still Johns constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, Johns girlfriend. Though Loris displeasure is exacerbated by the pairs constant consumption of beer and weed, shes not the one whos most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of Johns boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Teddy bear Ted seeks legal help from a young lawyer and a legendary, civil-rights attorney when the law declares him to be property and not a person.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Bridgets brand new relationship with Darcy has taken a plummet due to her jealousy of his workmate. Having previously left the publishing house she worked for to avoid her boss, Daniel, with whom she had an unsuccessful romance, she finds him along for the ride on her new job, which takes her to Thailand, and almost into his arms.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: A crazy Las Vegas bachelor party turns into a race against time when three hung-over groomsmen awaken after a night of drunken debauchery to find that the groom has gone missing, and attempt to get him to the alter in time for his wedding.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: A group of friends go to Thailand for a quiet and restrained stag party, but are dismayed to wake up in a mysterious hotel room, with a man missing and no memory of the night before. Of course, Alan manages to get himself in with the crowd.

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: Phil, Stu and Doug take Alan on a road trip to help him through a personal crisis.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A champion NASCAR drivers cosy position alongside his best friend at the top of the championship is threatened by a flamboyant French newcomer. With his confidence shattered, the driver draws on the help of his father and some eccentric training techniques to claw his way back to the top.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: A group of twentysomethings attempt to survive an onslaught of earthquakes, asteroids and other impending catastrophes.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: High school oddball Ducky idolises his best friend Andie but shes smitten with wealthy classmate Blane who might be interested - if she wasnt so poor. Do the pair have a future together?

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: A musical adaptation of Alice Walkers novel about the life-long struggles of an African-American woman living in the south during the early 1900s.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: In 1991, talented figure skater Tonya Harding becomes the first American woman to complete a triple axel during a competition. In 1994, her world comes crashing down when her ex-husband conspires to injure Nancy Kerrigan, a fellow Olympic hopeful, in a poorly conceived attack that forces the young woman to withdraw from the national championship. Hardings life and legacy instantly become tarnished as shes forever associated with one of the most infamous scandals in sports history.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: After discovering that he can travel through time, a young man uses his ability to win the woman of his dreams and save his friend from professional disaster.

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: A selfish gambler works off his debt by coaching a baseball team comprised of underprivileged youths.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Andy Dufresne and Ellis Boyd `Red Redding are two prisoners serving long sentences in the vicious Shawshank jail. The two come to terms with their imprisonment while surviving the sadistic acts of prison warden Samuel Norton, and for both, a different sort of redemption awaits.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieris Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozarts progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richards throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mouse Hunt
programme.desc: Slapstick tale which follows the misfortunes of two hard-up brothers whose plans to renovate and sell a valuable building are jeopardised by a rogue mouse. The brothers soon find themselves pulling out all the stops in order to evict their tiny resident.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: A New York couple go to an orphanage to adopt a brother for their only son, but instead come away with a little mouse. On arrival at his new home, the diminutive rodent receives a lukewarm welcome by the boy - and an even frostier reception from the pet cat. Featuring a mixture of live action and animation.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the childrens story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Radical activists take 300 hostages at an energy companys annual gala in a high-rise building. Its now up to a former soldier who works as a window cleaner to save the hostages trapped inside, including her younger brother.

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Competing teams of storm chasers find themselves in a fight for their lives as multiple systems converge over central Oklahoma.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: When Trojan prince Paris woos Helen, Queen of Sparta, away from her husband Menelaus, the legendary warrior Achilles is called to lead the armies of Greece against the city fortress of Troy.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

Stylish historical epic retelling the fierce battle at Thermopylae in 481BC. The Spartan king, Leonidas, and his tiny army of 300 followers provided inspiration for the whole of Greece as they fought the massed ranks of the Persian army whose commander, King Xerxes, had up to a million warriors at his disposal.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: Perseus travels the underworld to defeat the evil god Hades, who seeks to overthrow Zeus and bring hell to Earth.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.desc: Escaping postwar Europe, a visionary architect comes to America to rebuild his life, his career, and his marriage. On his own in a strange new country, he settles in Pennsylvania, where a wealthy and prominent industrialist recognises his talent.

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: After moving to New York City, kung fu prodigy Li Fong enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone arent enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: Hallow Road
programme.desc: Two parents receive a distressing late-night call from their teenage daughter, who has just accidentally hit a pedestrian. They jump in their car, racing to get there before anyone else. Disturbing revelations threaten to tear the family apart.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: A half-human, half-vampire superhero hunts down the brutal bloodsucking creature who infected his mother.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Gremlins 2: The New Batch
programme.desc: Six years after defeating the Gremlins, Billy and Kate have grown up and moved to New York. However, Billy stumbles across Gizmo in a genetics lab and when he gets wet, all hell breaks loose, and the stage is set for more deliciously bad taste humour.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black 3

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO tries to close her hard-partying brothers branch, he and his chief technical officer must inspire their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and save their jobs.

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: The Herdmans are six siblings who have a reputation for being the worst kids in the world. However, when they take over the local church pageant during the holidays, they just might teach a shocked community the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: George Bailey has so many problems he is thinking about ending it all - and its Christmas! As the angels discuss George, we see his life in flashback. As George is about to jump from a bridge, he ends up rescuing his guardian angel, Clarence - who then shows George what his town would have looked like if it hadnt been for all his good deeds over the years.

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: With his life unraveling around him, Bernard dusts off a jewelry box and unintentionally releases genie Flora, who might just be able to help him.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Three ghosts give a greedy network executive a long-overdue attitude adjustment over the Christmas period. Based on the Charles Dickens classic, `A Christmas Carol.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Living off the grid for 10 years, former CIA operative Jason Bourne finds himself back in action battling a sinister network that utilises terror and technology to maintain unchecked power.

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: An amnesiac is rescued at sea by the crew of an Italian fishing boat. Nearly dead, he carries nothing but the bullets in his back and the bank account number embedded in his hip. Although completely without identity or background, he possesses an array of extraordinary talents in fighting, linguistics and self-defence that speak of a dangerous past.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Life never becomes easy for ex-CIA agent Jason Bourne, who is forced out of hiding, and must return to Europe to find out exactly what happened in his past. Its not easy, as hes being framed for murder and his old employers are leading the manhunt.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Former CIA assassin Jason Bourne continues his quest to fill in memory gaps. When a `Guardian reporter stumbles onto his trail, Bourne spies his chance to blow the Blackbriar black-ops brigade wide open. With some very powerful people intent on keeping their skeletons buried, he is in more danger than ever before, as his former paymasters send a series of elite killers after their reformed ex-colleague.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: Enhanced CIA assassin Aaron Cross faces a battle to survive when his CIA employers decide to do away with his programme.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Galapagos
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough explores the volcanic islands and biological wonderland of Galapagos in this three-part documentary. Here, he charts the archipelagos explosive rise from the ocean millions of years ago, and takes a look at its unique wildlife.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Galapagos
programme.desc: David Attenborough stumbles upon species found nowhere else in the world that show how life has to quickly adapt to the islands ever-changing landscapes.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Galapagos
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores the unusual species that inhabit the unique islands of Galapagos, including giant tortoise Lonesome George.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia
programme.desc: Exploring the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Facing flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish, Lizzie investigates why so many strange creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia
programme.desc: Saying goodbye to the tropics and dipping into cool southern-coast waters. Coming face-to-face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish and huge blue whales, and playing with penguins and sea lions.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia
programme.desc: Completing the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Lizzie confront the challenges of survival in this region as she dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia
programme.desc: Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighbourhoods in nature.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia
programme.desc: The Emu is Australias biggest native bird and is the second largest bird in the world after the African ostrich, two metres tall, with an almost three metre running stride and totally flightless.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David descends beneath the waves at night in the state of the art Triton submersible, the first of its kind to visit the reef. He meets some of the tiny coral animals that built the reef and helped to turn it into an underwater wonderland.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David continues his exploration of the Great Barrier Reef, aboard the research vessel the Alucia. He discovers the incredible animals that visit the reef every year, from birds to whales, some travelling thousands of kilometres to get there.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David examines what the next few decades hold for this remarkable community of animals, as well as what is being done to save it.

programme.title: Australias Hidden Islands
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef, the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Australias Hidden Islands
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. Its an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Australias Hidden Islands
programme.desc: Christmas Island is a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and its stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: Australias Hidden Islands
programme.desc: Fraser Island is the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow, on this nutrient poor bed of sand, life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australias Ocean Wonder
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australias Ocean Wonder
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets
programme.desc: The Hudson Bay lowlands are part of North Americas largest wetland. Over 300,000 square kilometers of muskeg, a vast bogland as far as the eye can see characterised by water soaked peat, mosses and stunted trees.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets
programme.desc: The third longest waterway in North America, the Yukon River, flows through wide open valleys and narrow channels over 3000 kilometres northwest towards the storm tossed Bering Sea.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets
programme.desc: Its November at Cape Tatnam. Winter is coming to the lower Western shore of Hudson Bay. The ice, which should be forming on Hudson Bay by now, is nowhere to be seen. 2016 has been the warmest year on record.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Global Adventure
programme.desc: In his mid-eighties, David Attenborough embarked on a seven-year journey. From the depths of the Great Barrier Reef to the ancient rainforests of Borneo, following his adventure across the globe.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Global Adventure: Home Planet
programme.desc: In his eighties, David Attenborough embarked on a seven-year journey. From the stunning Great Barrier Reef to the rainforests of Borneo, follow his voyage across the globe.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Global Adventure: The Rise of Nature
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores the rise of life on our planet, from the explosion of first life on seabeds hundreds of millions of years ago to life today.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: A notorious brotherhood of cheetahs rule the southern plains of the Serengeti, until a raging bushfire turns their world upside down.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: Julz and park scout Simon track the Kakuli pack who they filmed previously, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. The Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters
programme.desc: Trace dazzling waterways all over the world, from volcanic rivers in Russias far east to geothermal streams in Florida. Watch as beavers transform entire landscapes with their well-engineered dams, then enjoy a winter spa day with manatees.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: The next stage of lemur introductions keeps the primate care staff on their toes, while gibbons Kim and Tien head back to their familiar stomping ground.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: In Dao Tien a group of misbehaving doucs need to be relocated and female golden-cheeked gibbon Tungs release is hampered by the weather.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Concerns for chimp Jestah who has a lump on his jaw. Lemurs Fennel and Ben trial life with the guenons but youngster Biff proves a bit full on.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Global Adventure
programme.desc: In his mid-eighties, David Attenborough embarked on a seven-year journey. From the depths of the Great Barrier Reef to the ancient rainforests of Borneo, following his adventure across the globe.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Global Adventure: The Rise of Nature
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores the rise of life on our planet, from the explosion of first life on seabeds hundreds of millions of years ago to life today.

programme.title: Gladiators
programme.desc: Young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Watch as a poison dart frog unleashes a venomous barrage, observe a turf war between a jaguar and a caiman, and watch a bear cross paths with a defending tarantula.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters
programme.desc: Trace dazzling waterways all over the world, from volcanic rivers in Russias far east to geothermal streams in Florida. Watch as beavers transform entire landscapes with their well-engineered dams, then enjoy a winter spa day with manatees.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: The next stage of lemur introductions keeps the primate care staff on their toes, while gibbons Kim and Tien head back to their familiar stomping ground.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: In Dao Tien a group of misbehaving doucs need to be relocated and female golden-cheeked gibbon Tungs release is hampered by the weather.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Concerns for chimp Jestah who has a lump on his jaw. Lemurs Fennel and Ben trial life with the guenons but youngster Biff proves a bit full on.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: Encountering an elephant as Julz and Henry track the Kakumbi pups who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. ZCPs lion specialist Thandie Mweetwa counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: The Kakumbi see a leopard whos been stalking them, Julz goes fishing with Simon, explores mealtime pack hierarchy and witnesses a heartbreaking vigil for a badly injured Kakumbi pup.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: Heading back to the den with the Kakumbi who are mourning the loss of two pups. A look at a hyena den and lion pride trying to take down a buffalo and catching up with the Manzi who are in a standoff with a leopard and a herd of angry elephants.

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: Journey to the harsh Okavango Delta as the Matata Pride do battle with wildfires and flooding in a high-stakes fight to keep their cubs alive.

programme.title: Africas Wild Year
programme.desc: n Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth, and raise their young.

programme.title: Africas Wild Year
programme.desc: Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Africas Wild Year
programme.desc: Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.desc: After fighting with Lisa, Bart runs away from home to teach the family a lesson.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Four wittily woven tales that, like egg nog with lashings of brandy, are sweet and sharp in equal measure. Pop princess Katy Perry guest stars.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Krusty and his daughter spend an eventful Christmas with the Simpsons. Reverend Lovejoy tries to add to his congregation.

programme.title: Classic Christmas Movies
programme.desc: Its a Wonderful Life: The most celebrated and beloved Christmas movie of them all. Film Critics Ian Nathan, Stephen Armstrong, Neil Norman and Christina Newland discuss.

programme.title: Caught on Dashcam: Winter Specials
programme.desc: A seasonal look at the most astonishing, downright bizarre, and shocking footage of real-life car crashes as video cameras catch road rage incidents, dangerous manoeuvres, and huge pile-ups.

programme.title: Ten Little Elves
programme.desc: The Ten Little Elves must find the reindeer doctor as all of Santas reindeer have gone down with a cough. Can they prevent a Christmas catastrophe?

programme.title: The Christmas Movie Countdown
programme.desc: Simon Callow walks through a top 25 countdown and reveals the Yuletide number one, as voted for by the public.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer and Grampa embark upon a dangerous mission to smuggle drugs from Canada. Will they outfox the border guards?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Selma wants to adopt a baby from an orphanage, but the forms need a fathers name. Will Homer Simpson do?

programme.title: The Amazing Mr Blunden
programme.desc: Adventure arrives for teenagers Jamie and Lucy in the form of a mysterious old man, Mr Blunden, who offers their mum the opportunity to become the caretaker of a ruined country house, one thats said to be haunted.

programme.title: Christmas Carole
programme.desc: A Christmas-hating businesswoman has earned her a fortune, but its made her a worse human being. The truth is that Carole is a monumentally mean person, positively Scrooge-like. And, just like Ebeneezer, needs a Christmas lesson.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Homer and Neds Hail Mary Pass
programme.desc: After teaching famous athletes some victory dance moves, Homer is chosen to produce the Super Bowl half-time show.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart defies Marges wishes and goes to a rap concert. In big trouble, he fakes his own kidnapping.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The secrets out. As Springfield legalises gay marriage, one of its fine citizens plans to come out of the closet.

programme.title: The Nutcracker
programme.desc: Gary Avis, Meaghan Grace Hinkis and Ricardo Cervera star in this stunning performance of Tchaikovskys magical ballet, recorded at the Royal Opera House in December 2012.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Rob and Romesh Vs...
programme.desc: Romesh introduces Rob to the world of Hip Hop, taking him on a trip to New York to meet legends like 50 Cent and sample the birthplace of Hip Hop.

programme.title: Micky Flanagans Christmas
programme.desc: Micky explores our craze for Christmas, finding some strange traditions along the way. He explores what a three-bird roast is and why there is the sudden need for a new sofa.

programme.sub-title: Dame Laura Kenny, Big Zuu, Tony Bellew
programme.desc: The gang are joined by ALOTO all-stars Tony Bellew, Dame Laura Kelly and Big Zuu for an action-packed Last Dance episode full of iconic games from the series.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: The team are faced with one of the most dangerous threats they have ever come across - a flesh-eating fungus that turns its victims into human shells intent only on spreading the fungus further. It takes over any person who comes into contact with it, and it proves resistant to everything the team can throw at it.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: When Christine Johnson and the military invade the ARC, the team are forced to flee. They take refuge in an abandoned 1930s cabin in the woods, but it is not long before danger appears in the form of vicious Pliocene-era phorusrhacids or `terror birds. Finding themselves besieged by the creatures, the team have nothing but their ingenuity and their bare hands to help them survive.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: An anomaly opens in the middle of a car breakers yard, and a Cretaceous-era dinosaur comes through - followed by a medieval knight on horseback who thinks he is chasing a dragon. programme.title: Arctic Armageddon

programme.desc: After being stung by an artefact bee, Petes ex-wife is turned into a human queen bee.

programme.title: Primeval

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: When Christine Johnson and the military invade the ARC, the team are forced to flee. programme.desc: Action-packed Christmas special looking at how the police respond to street crime. In Colwyn Bay, a man is fined for urinating on a Christmas tree, and a fight in Leicester city centre ends in one man being arrested. In Peterborough, a drunk man found covered in blood admits to having taken heroin, and a police officer is attacked while attending an incident outside a nightclub.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: After a New Jersey mayor is kidnapped, the Fugitive Task Force works against the clock to untangle a web of political conspiracies that may aid their investigation; Rays camping trip with his father and Caleb takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Adipurush
programme.desc: Raghav, the prince of the Ikshvaku dynasty from Kosala, tries to rescue his wife, Janaki, from the demon king Lankesh.

programme.title: Sui Dhaaga
programme.desc: An unemployed small-town man defies all odds and naysayers and starts his own garment business.

programme.title: Soorma
programme.desc: East Indian field hockey player Sandeep Singh attempts to return to the sport after a incident leaves him in a wheelchair.

programme.title: Batla House
programme.desc: Police conduct a raid on a house in Delhi, India, to search for terrorist suspects.

programme.title: Double XL
programme.desc: Two plus size women, one from the heartland of Uttar Pradesh and the other from urban New Delhi, discover themselves as they navigate life, celebrate female friendship and embrace body positivity, breaking the myth that beauty corresponds to size.

programme.title: Phir Aayi Hasseen Dillruba
programme.desc: Escaping from the police in Agra, Rani and Rishu decide to elope together. When their plan goes awry, Rani seeks a helping hand from a kind admirer.
